pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Dynamic versioning plugin for PoetryThis is a Python 3.7+ plugin for [Poetry 1.2.0+](https://github.com/sdispater/poetry)to enable dynamic versioning based on tags in your version control system,powered by [Dunamai](https://github.com/mtkennerly/dunamai).The package `poetry-dynamic-versioning-plugin` has been merged into[`poetry-dynamic-versioning`](https://pypi.org/project/poetry-dynamic-versioning),under the optional feature named `plugin`. Please install that package instead.
